Author: jl777c#5810
Content:
144 * 12.5 = 1800 BTC per day from miners
daily trading volume: 1600000 BTC per day
circulating coins 17 million (maybe as little at 12 million)

if 1800/1.6 million or 1800/12 million is a takeover, then yes miners have taken over BTC
most other PoW coins will have similar percentages
miners are subject to hardfork attack, ie. XMR, SIA, etc

PoS is all about the initial distribution, which can be highly concentrated or just concentrated
PoW isnt better than PoS, PoS isnt better than PoW, it all depends on the details
